How about something goes wrong with the transfer?
Option 1: They swap bodies but not lives
Option 2: The machine did not work but everybody other than Lisa thinks it did!
13512113.title: Something else

13512114.content: How about Lisa gets cold feet and tries to back out of the deal at the very last moment, causing unforseen complications?
13512114.title: Something else

13513.content:
Lisa chose Priya Bhatia. The other women would have made a great Lisa too, but she felt really bad for Priya. She was definitely the worst off of the three. Lisa didn't want to be 23 years older, but Priya had lived the longest and worst life of all of them life. It would be time for Priya to enjoy life.

Lisa asked Tina " Can I get more information on Priya?". Tina pulled out a file and handed it to Lisa.

Priya's file gave Lisa insight on Priya. Priya was a few inches shorter than Lisa and weighted more. Priya in her photo appeared to have child bearing hips and some love handles. Her face was rounder, not to mention a double chin and and her black hair tied in a bun.. Lisa was used to being fit and attractive. Priya looked like she could be much more attractive if she would start using make-up. Barely skimming through the rest of Priya's file, Lisa just read the medical summary to make sure Priya was healthy and free of any diseases or illnesses.

While still holding Priya file, Lisa asked "So when can I switch with Priya? She really needs to get out of her life."

Although Tina didn't show it, she was amazed. She hadn't expected anyone to partake in this usually one sided program. She thought Lisa was genuinely a very kind and giving person or very naive. Regardless, she began printing out the necessary paperwork that Lisa needed to fill out and sign before the switch. The large pile of paperwork she handed to Lisa would take some time to fill out. "While you're filling out all this, I'm going to get a hold of Priya when we can schedule you both to come in."

It took Lisa almost an hour to fill out all the paperwork that the Nexus required. Since she was trading lives permanently instead of renting, much more forms needed to be filled out. Just as she was about done, Tina came back in.

Tina said "I managed to get a hold of Priya, she said she could be here..."
13513.title: Priya Bhatia

choices: Priya has an extra surprise for Lisa
135131.content:
"She said she could be here in about an hour. She just needs to finish a few things at the gas station and drop one of the kids at school. She'll fill you in on the details very shortly, since you're gonna have to take over when
you two swap."

The very last part of this exchange made Lisa pause even so slightly. While she didn't reconsider her decision at that point, the perspective of a good deed motivating her enough so that she wouldn't, she started to realize what actually swapping with Priya would imply. She would actually become someone else .

She had another look at the photo she was given. Sure, Priya wasn't downright ugly or anything but she was more than ten years older AND a mother to boot. Her head was starting to spin just thinking about the actual consequences of her choice when Priya came into the room...
135131.title: in an hour.

1351312.content: Is the surprise a good one or a bad one for Lisa?
1351312.title: Priya has an extra surprise for Lisa

13513121.content: Is it perhaps the news that Priya's husband died after she originally filled in the forms?
13513121.title: It's a good surprise.

135131211.content:
As Priya Bhatia entered the room Lisa noticed she was wearing a blue t-shirt with a skirt, her hair was tied in a bun and her expression was tearful.

"Mrs. Bhatia, this is Lisa the girl you're swapping with." Tina introduced Priya to Lisa as she shook her hand. Lisa smelled something strong as she neared Priya, maybe curry?

"Nice to meet you." Priya told Lisa as they shook hands. Lisa could hear the accent. She then looked at Priya's hands, as they were slightly larger. Hands that would soon be hers.

"Nice to meet you too." Lisa replied liking the woman.

"We didn't tell you yet, but Mrs. Bhatia's husband recently died of an aneurysm leaving her a widow." Tina explained to Lisa.

"Oh, you are? My condolences to you." Lisa told Priya.

"Yes, I'm alone except for my youngest daughter. I cannot thank you for swapping with me." Priya told Lisa beaming with joy.

"It's...nothing." Lisa told the widow showing a hesitant smile. This was really happening now. She was really going to swap with this lady and she would become her. Lisa could tell however Priya had a sensitive soul. Lisa was sure Priya would take good care of her family and friends.

"I think it's time we get started on it." Tina told the ladies. If you will follow me Mrs. Bhatia, I will take you to your room. If you would strip down Lisa and change into the hospital gown, we can start the procedure." Lisa nodded her head as the other two women left the room. This were her few last moments as Lisa Hale. Soon that would change.
135131211.title: That's the news.

1351312112.content: Do we look at Priya's POV or does something go wrong?
1351312112.title: Priya's POV/ something goes wrong

13513122.content: Lisa doesn't this know yet, but Priya recently got pregnant and is just now starting to show.
13513122.title: It's a bad surprise.

135131221.content:
"That's fine I guess." Lisa said as she sounded a bit disappointed. She wasn't particularly looking forward to becoming someone that was old enough to be her mother. She reassured herself that she wouldn't have to worry about settling down and starting a family since Priya and her husband already 'took' care of that. Still, Lisa felt bad for Priya. She was born and raised in a world where she never had the opportunity to follow her passions or dreams. Lisa figured if she couldn't achieve her dreams, the least she could do would be to let someone else live their dreams with her life.

"Lisa, I'm glad the Nexus found you. Most life sales are quite rare to begin with, but you're the first person to actually participate in this program" Tina told Lisa.

"So when is this going to happen?" Lisa asked.

"Well, I've already contacted Ms. Bhatia as soon as you started filling out the paperwork and told her all about you. She said that she would be here within an hour" Tina explained.

"I wish I was able to spend some time with my family before I hand them over to Priya but maybe doing this suddenly might be better for everyone." Lisa said with a hint of disappointment as she signed the finalizing paperwork declaring her intent to exchange her life with Priya.

"There is one thing Ms. Hale, these purchases include a non-disclosure agreement that prohibits both parties from discussing their sale. It's designed to protect both of you. Violations can create legal problems and allow one party to seek damages against the other." Tina explained to Lisa before she got out of her chair. "Just imagine how your family would react if they knew Priya became their "daughter" or if Priya's husband, Rajiv found out she abandoned their family?. Your parents could disown Priya or your new husband could kick you out onto the street. Aside from you two and the Nexus, nobody can be privy to this sale." Tina said while sounding like a lawyer.

"It sounds harsh, but I understand. I want both of us to be successful..." Lisa started to say before she was cut off by Tina's phone ringing.

Tina picked up the phone and answered it "This is Tina, I'm with a client right now." she told whoever had called her. Lisa watched as Tina seemed to be interested in whatever was important enough to pull her away from their business.

"That's great. I'll be down there to get her in a few minutes. Thanks." Tina said as she hung up the phone. "That was our secretary at the lobby and she just said that Priya walked in. Lets get you into the transference room and ready to go." Tina explained as she got up out of her chair and motioned for Lisa to follow her.
135131221.title: This is it

1351312213.content:
Lisa opened her eyes, but she couldn't see anything. She felt really dizzy like her brain had been shaken through thoroughly. A voice suddenly counted down and then the lights went on. Lisa closed her eyes immediately, her eyes were too sensitive to look straight into the bright lamp on top of her. The door suddenly opened and a woman around her mother's age came inside. She looked worried as she looked down on top of Lisa and asked: "Tell me what is your real name?"

"Lisa, Lisa Hale." Lisa answered. The woman looked shocked, and Lisa wondered what was wrong. And why did her voice sound different? She noticed some sort of heavy accent, but she couldn't really place it, as her mind was so foggy...

"What happened ?" Lisa was getting more and more scared. The fact that english word seemed to be hard to come by was also unnverving, even though she couldn't really tell whether it was because she was so tired or for some sort of other reason...

"Lisa, I'm Emma Nail director of the Nexus. Now I want you to relax, and slowly breath in and out." Lisa nodded and started relaxing. She somehow managed to calm herself down, the heavy breathing relaxing somewhat.

"Are you better now?" Emma asked Lisa. Lisa slowly nodded.

"First let me tell you Lisa, that we never had a thing like this happen before. Our team is still looking to try and figure out how this could have happened. For now let me say we don't know what caused this."

"Why? What happened?" Lisa asked getting concerned.

"Lisa when you were hooked up with for your transference you were supposed to get each other's life, she yours and you hers. But something went wrong. The machine transferred a lot more than that."

"What is it?" Lisa asked her voice getting higher.

"When you would have swapped just lives, you would just keep your own body only when you would look into a reflection of yourself you would see some of the things that were important in that other person's lives."

She paused.

"We usually do that to ease one's transfer, even in the more...let's say permanent cases like yours."

She looked...uncertain ?

"Instead of the normal outcome, you and Mrs.Bhatia seem to have completely switched bodies."

When Lisa heard that, she felt like a rock hit her stomach hard. She was already somewhat uncertain about the swap. She knew
she was doing a great deed, which made her feel better, but she kinda held on to the fact she was, somewhat, holding on to her original body. This revelation hit her particularly hard.

Emma grabbed a handheld mirror and held it in front of her.

Lisa grabbed the mirror and noticing her hand she took a look in the mirror and she almost fainted. In the reflection she saw an EXACT copy of Priya Bhatia's face. No make-up to speak of, a MUCH rounder and older face whoch sported a double chin and with graying hair neatly tied in a bun.

She felt around her face and saw in the mirror her reflection doing the same thing. This really confirmed it, she hoped it might be a trick of some sort, but when she looked at her hands she knew they were not the ones she had known. Those were far chubbier than her own and dirty, unkempt fingernails were unmistakably different from those she had just a few minutes (or was it hours ?) ago.

Lisa's head was spinning as she didn't know what would happen. What would they do now? How long would it take to fix this?
Would they even try, as the original transfer was supposedly permanent ?

"I think you might have a lot of questions, how about we go to my office and talk about it?" Emma suggested. Lisa nodded a little. She sat up but then she felt another dizzy spell. She clumsily got up and slowly started walking, her new (and very large) love handles reinforcing the feeling of a body as foreign as possible.

"That's good Lisa, you don't have to walk fast, just take your time." Emma suggested.

Walking felt extremely odd, Priya's breasts being much larger (and her body generally chubbier, presumably from the lack of exercise and her three pregnancies) than her own so Lisa had to straighten her back more to not being pushed down by the weight of those. Her hips were bigger too, showing the signs of childbearing.

Emma opened the door to her office. "I think you know this person rather well." Lisa walked inside the room and the first thing she noticed was the person that was standing there. She recognized that brown hair, that physique and that face pretty well. It was her old body. Lisa was staring at her old self looking at her expression. Priya was...
1351312213.title: Lisa swapped bodies with Priya.

choices: They sat down to talk with each other
Lisa was at her new home
13513122131.content:
“Hello, I’m Priya,” the woman in Lisa’s former body said in greeting. “Hi, I’m Lisa,” the now older woman replied, feeling embarrassed by how thick her new accent sounded compared to Priya in her old body. Lisa looked at her old face, the face she’d seen in the mirror all her life, but which was now animated by a completely different person. It was quite possibly the eeriest experience she had had. She took the seat next to her old body and which only brought to the fore the stark differences between her former physique and her current form. The original Priya seemed happy with the development, but there was also concern in her eyes. “First of all, ladies, let me extend to you our sincere apologies for this unexpected development,” Emma started, “We will of course monitor you both for a time to ensure that there are no unforeseen complication, but …” Emma continued, but Lisa had to stop her, “unforeseen complications?” she asked, struggling to pronounce the word. Part of her felt she should know the meaning of the words, but she was struggling to keep up with what Emma was saying as it was.

“She means that there could be problems later,” the former Priya offered in explanation with a kind smile. Lisa felt embarrassed but she smiled back in thanks. “Yes, exactly. Well, from our readings, and as you can see the rest of the exchange did go as planned. You now have each other’s language skills. There are other skills and knowledge as well that were transferred to make living your new lives easier,” Emma explained, giving each woman the practiced smile of a businesswoman. Priya seemed more at ease after hearing that the rest of the exchange had gone as planned. Lisa squirmed in her seat, wondering what parts of her mind she might have traded along with her body. As she shifted in her seat she could feel her love handles brushing against the sides of the chair.

Emma continued, “With our usual temporary swaps this might be a bigger complication, but given that your exchange is permanent I would consider this an enhancement.” The original Lisa gave a weak smile while the other woman practically beamed. “Yes, this will make acclimating to my new life a lot easier,” Priya offered. The two women looked at Lisa, expecting her to comment, but the former young lady felt too embarrassed that she now had such a thick accent to say much, so she just gave a week smile.

“Now, we usually don’t recommend much contact between the subjects, but given the exceptional circumstances, I think you both might benefit from at least some contact in the beginning until you get settled into your new selves,” Emma suggested, “That being said, remember that you,” she said pointing at Lisa’s original body, “are Lisa Hale, and you” she said pointing at Lisa’s current body, “are Priya Bhatia.” Both women nodded. “You have each signed the paperwork and are legally the owners of your current bodies and lives. Do with them as you see fit and be mindful of the non-disclosure agreement you have both signed,” Emma continued.

Both women looked at each other, the new Lisa beaming with youthful excitement and the new Priya doing her best to control the feeling that she had made a terrible mistake. The two of them then received packages with information about their new lives. They were told that some of it was already part of the transfer, but reading it would reinforce the knowledge. They were warned not to share the files with anyone to avoid any issues with their non-disclosure agreements. It wasn’t much later that …
13513122131.title: ...happy, but looking somewhat concerned.

135131221311.content:
After various formalities, Emma stood up and smiled at both of you, "I'll leave you two alone to chat", she said leaving the room. Lisa sat opposite of former self, still not fully coming to terms with what she had ultimately done. Looking at her old body, with her young, pretty face and toned, athletic body beaming back at her, it was evident that she got worse end of this deal. She again felt her all-round thicker frame and accompanying love handles jiggling and brushing the sides of her chair, feeling incredibly foreign, and completely different to her former cheerleading body.
It comforted her however, as she continued to look into the beaming reflection of her former self, that she had truly made Priyas' dreams come true. She now has a fresh start, and the slim, attractive body that she'd clearly always wanted. Priya popped up in a gleaming tone as she stood up to look in the mirror, looking ecstatic as she felt her youthful face and rubbed her new athletic frame.. "this is me now" she says, "my body, I'm Lisa Hale", She hears her new fluent voice and she laughs with glee. "Oh Lisa, I can't thank you enough, this is the best thing to ever happen to me".."I guess I should call you Priya now given that is who you are now". Being called Priya really hit Lisa hard, as a lump began to form in her throat, thinking to herself of the years of life she had lost..the friends in family she'd never see again..it finally hit her, she was 39 year old wife, and mother of three Priya Bhatia, and the 18 year old girl standing there was Lisa Hale...a part of her badly wanted to reverse the situation knowing deep down she'd made a terrible and life-changing mistake. She stood up and went to the mirror, further feeling the jiggling of her new love handles, standing next to her former body, the differences were clear as day as she felt her new face. Being much older, with wrinkles and bags under the eyes and a double chin to boot, she then looked at her body, her new larger breasts sagging on her chest, giving them a feel over her clothes confirming the differences in firmness, but the bigger size at least being a consolation, making her feel more like the older, bigger woman she now was. She felt her backside and hips, formerly firm it now just felt like fat, with no definition whatsoever. Priya saw the concern on Lisa's face and almost looked disappointed at her former self, she was still confused as to why such a beautiful girl who was just about to go to college would give up her life like this. Deciding to quiz her on this, she piped up and asked "although I am obviously incredibly grateful for what you have given me... may I ask why a girl would give up a 20 years of her life"? Lisa spoke for the first time since Emma left the room in her new thick accent finally as she said "I wanted to give you the life you deserved but I did not think I would be trading my athletic body for your older one" she said in a disappointed tone, she found herself struggling to get the words out as her new language skills became evident, this still coming as a great shock. Priyas sympathetic tone became more stern now as she heard how badly Lisa was taking this. "Well Priya" she said "you offered me this opportunity, meaning that the athletic body you are talking about is all mine and that older body you are talking about is yours, as hard as that may be to take, the quicker you accept it the quicker you are going to accustom yourself into your new life" Lisa was confused, she didn't understand what Priya was saying to her to a full extent, this further hitting home at how different your new life truly was. Priya noticed this and explained again "your life will be easier if you accept your body as your own" Lisa, as much as she didn't want to believe it, agreed with Priya, looking in the mirror again trying to tell herself that this is her body and always had been. "you will enjoy your new life Priya" Pryia said reassuringly".."it may take some getting used to but over time but I'm sure you will grow to love your husband and be a rewarding mother to your children..we will obviously keep in touch to see how we both are as this situation is new so I think we should jump into our new lives fully". Priya saying this to further encourage Lisa to jump into her new life. "Okay Lisa" she said to Priya, knowing deep down she was right, she was now Priya and needed to act like it. "I suppose I better go home to my new life now" Priya said "here's my number so we can keep in touch with further updates on how to fully intergrate ourselves into our new lives". As she said that, you began the plans to head home to your new life as Priya Bhatia.
135131221311.title: They sat down to talk with each other

1351312213111.content:
Lisa made her way to her new home as Priya Bhatia and was glad to find the modest home empty. The small kitchen was right next to the entrance and there was a note on the fridge. The not was in Priya’s native script, not English, but Lisa read it with easy. It scared her a bit since all through her drive in Priya’s minivan she’d struggled reading anything more complex than road signage. She could do it, it was just more difficult. However, she instantly understood the flowing letters on the note,

“I hope you feel better, dear. Don’t worry about anything today, Arjun is helping me at the gas station today. Reyansh took Karima to the library. You can rest today.
Adit.”

Lisa looked around the house. It wasn’t as nice as what she was used to, but she could tell her new family worked hard at making the house look nice. It was so quite the only sound was the jingle of the bracelets and jewelry that had come with her new body. She’d thought of taking them off, unused to the sound, but she’d been petrified at the thought that something bad could happen to her children if she did. There were pictures of her new family all around the house. In many the original Priya was dressed in Western clothes, but she seemed to prefer more traditional, Indian Sarees.

She looked down at the clothes her new body had come with and saw why the original Priya would prefer to wear a Saree, it was much more colouful and it suited her better. Lisa picked up a picture of Priya’s husband embracing his wife. He wasn’t particularly handsome by Lisa’s standards. The man was paunchy, with only wisps of hair left on top, and a thick beard. His skin was a bit darker than her own and he was about half a head taller. For some reason Lisa felt a pull towards the man in the picture, he wasn’t her type at all, she liked guys like Tony Petters, the captain of the team Lisa cheered for, yet there was something about him that the new Priya found deeply attractive.

Lisa thought back to her conversation with the new owner of her original body. She was Priya Bhatia now, that was her husband, this was her house and this was her life now!

I
1351312213111.title: Follow Lisa's POV

1352.content:
"We have a few people who would love to have a new lease on a normal life again. Here's the first two we have.." Tina said as she handed Lisa some profiles.

The first one was Sandra Burke, a 20 year old gymnast who was badly burned in a car crash a couple months ago. She was on her way to making it into the Olympics before she suffered burns on nearly 60 percent of her body. She's healing slowly, but she is not likely to be able to return to gymnastics for many years.

The second one was Melinda Rogers, a 36 year old mother of 3 that is battling ovarian and breast cancer. Melinda worked as a weather meteorologist for a local news station before her cancer began making her too ill to work. Her husband, Michael died a few years back leaving her to raise her children alone. With a new lease on life, she could try to find a way to keep a roof over her former children's' heads.

The third one was Alison Schultz, a 29 year old nurse that became paralyzed from the waist down after a skiing accident on vacation. Being confined to a wheelchair has made it difficult to effectively treat patients at the hospital where she works. With a new life, she could become a great nurse again and possibly save more lives.

Lisa thought that all these women could make a great Lisa Hale. She thought about which one she should trade lives with. Lisa spent a few minutes going through the profiles before deciding...
1352.title: The Medical Relief Program

14.content: Who will you start with?
14.title: Start with someone other than Lisa

141.content:
"Just follow me, Angelina," the woman in scrubs said. "My name is Tina, and I'll be administering your transition today. I understand this is your first time?"

"Yes," Angelina said, a little nervous as she followed the woman back into the complex. She hadn't known what to expect, but once she got over the jitters, she couldn't help but feel that it was a little disappointing. The hallways felt more like the back area of a clinic than a strange or mystic realm that would transform her life. "The brochure said that the process was painless, but that it could be disorienting...."

"Both are absolutely true," Tina said, stopping at a door. "It's really difficult to explain until you've gone through it once, but I have done it myself and I assure you it's really quite painless. I'm going to let you into the room here, and once you get in, if you would change out of your clothes and into the gown provided, we'll get things under way. Just take a seat on the stool, we'll worry about the fancy chair once you've changed. I'll be taking your clothes and your purse once you're out of them, and handing those to the person who's taking your life. Once we're finished, I'll bring their items to you so that you can get dressed. After that, we'll go over the specifics of the person who's life you'll be living while they rent yours, and give you a little time to settle into it before you leave. Any questions?"

"Oh, so I don't get to find out about the person who's renting my life until after it's done?" Angelina asked.

"No, I'll be perfectly honest, we've found that it creates problems. We had too many people back out when they found that the life they would be living wasn't appealing to them. In general, our clients lead nice lives, and can afford our services, but they all have reasons to want to be someone else for a little while. We've found that by setting your requirements for rental rate, and availability, in advance, we're able to find a client who can meet those requirements and execute the agreement. After all, they are the client, if you wanted to vacation in someone else's life of your choosing, then you would be the client."

"I guess that makes sense," Angelina said, stepping into the room. Despite what Tina had said, she found it hard to not look at the futuristic couch in the center of the room, or at the circle of strange and arcane symbols that were carved into the tile floor around the chair.

Minutes after getting dressed in the simple white hospital gown, Tina took her clothing away and helped her into the softly padded couch. A clear shield was lowered in place over her eyes and lights began to dance across her face as Tina began to work her magic. A strange pulling sensation enveloped Lisa from the bottom of her toes to the top of her head, and the flashing lights before her eyes began to blur together as magic pulled her identity from her. Moments later, she drifted into a deep sleep while a new identity was laid over her body, and skills were downloaded from the client and mapped into her own brain.

When Angelina woke, it was with a different identity, but who's?
141.title: Angelina Stein

14221.content:
People bustled around the waiting room of The Nexus as clients and renters where assigned and led through the side door of the waiting room. Moments later reemerging, sometimes with a new awkwardness and others with a sense of confidence and renewed vitality.

A women in scrubs and holding a clipboard walked out the side door. "we are ready for you now Mr. ________. If you would please come this way" she said. Getting up out of the waiting-room chair _____ followed the women in Scrubs.



One of the Hale's, Robert or Martin

Robert Hale: Age 46, is Lisa's father. He works hard as a software engineer and keeps the family in a comfortable standard of living. His work requires him to travel frequently, overseeing projects around the globe, and in recent years, he's only been home 1-2 weeks a month
.
Martin Hale: Age 16, Lisa's younger brother. He's a 5'10" soccer player and all around party kind of guy. Many of his friends have been seen pining after Lisa, but most consider her to be 'out of their league.' Martin has a tendency to get others in trouble, and Lisa has made it a point to distance herself from him in recent years.

Or Tom Anderson or another male

Tom Anderson: Age 18, is Lisa's on again / off again boyfriend. Currently off after Tom told her she shouldn't worry about getting the money to pay for college because there's no point of her going to school if she's going to stay home and take care of the kids. Tom will be attending the same college as Lisa plans to, but is attending on a foot ball scholarship. He stands 6'3", well muscled and is handsome in a 'rugged' kind of way.
14221.title: Male

142211.content:
Who are you?

Robert Hale age 46. Lisa's software engineering father, who is always traveling the world overseeing projects and is almost never home?

Or

Martin Hal age 16. Lisa's party loving athletic younger brother, who has a habit of getting others around him in trouble?
142211.title: One of the Hale's

choices: Robert Chooses the correct door and waits for Tina
Wrong door, takes someone's place with a different service program
1422111.content:
People bustled around the waiting-room of the Nexus as clients and renters where assigned and led through the side door of the waiting-room. Moments later re-emerging, sometimes with a new awkwardness and others with a sense of confidence and renewed vitality.

Robert Hale was excited to experience a new life, even if it was for a short time. “I need a vacation” he thought to himself as he sat on the waiting room chair.
“ It was awesome of the company to offer me this vacation and to pay for everything. What an ingenious way for a vacation, who knew there was a clinic that actually allowed you to swap lives. Who would have thought when my boss came to me asking if I would like a vacation that he would smile when I told him I couldn't I was still behind in our project. I expected him to be mad but he just said, “that's okay Robert, you've been on the job for weeks. We have partnered with a company to help rest our employees and potentially recruit new hires all at once.” I was lost, I thought he was telling me he was going to replace me, until he explained the Nexus and their life swapping technology. Then my boss told me about the contest our company ran to help recruit incoming college freshman. Those who entered the contest were considering pursing software engineering and our company offered the winner a few weeks of on the job experience as well as a fast-track in the hiring program if they did well and wished to pursue the field. Our company would have a team leader switch with the contest winner for a few weeks so the leader could rest and relax while the winner received valuable experience. A win-win. I wonder who I'll become. The boss wasn't very clear on who the winner was when he told me to visit the clinic, he just said that I would be a recent High school graduate getting ready to leave on the last vacation before college.” Robert thought as his mind wandered while waiting.

A women in scrubs appeared, holding a clipboard, walked out the side door. “We are ready for you now, Mr Hale. If you would please come this way” she said. Getting up out of the waiting-room chair Robert followed the women through the doorway.

“My name is Tina.” the women in scrubs said as she held open the side door. “We will be heading down the hall and... oops.” Tina said as she suddenly stopped in front of Robert.

“What is it?”Robert said as he barely stopped in time to avoid running into her.

“Oh everything is okay, I just forgot to grab the full file. I grabbed the switch list but forgot the full personal file for you and your rental. I'll meet you in the room. Go down the hall, follow it around the corner, continue down the hall and you are the last door to the right. It will take me 30 seconds, go ahead I'll be right there.” Tina said as she turned to go back out the doorway to nurse desk.

Robert continued down the hall and around the corner all the way to the end of the hall where he came across two rooms. Does he remember to enter the correct room on the right?
1422111.title: Robert Hale

choices: It worked normally, Robert has a new life only
Something happened, Robert has a new life and body
14221111.content:
“sorry about that, still getting use to everything” Tina said as she entered into the room.
Still getting use to everything?” Robert said catching Tina's faux pas.
Tina gave a slight mischievous smile. “you don't think your company is the only one that gives employees a break from their life do you?”
“so you are really someone else? Who are you?” Robert asked curiously
“I'm Tina”, Tina said gesturing to her name tag and credentials
“I see that, I mean who were you before you became Tina”
“Oh, I'll never tell” Tina said with a wink and a smile. “Now Mr. Hale I need you to strip out of all of your clothes and put them in this bin, and put on this robe” Tina said gesturing to the thin hospital robe and plastic bin she set on the table. “while you are changing I will go an check and make sure your partner is ready”
“wait who is my partner, I still don't know who I am swapping with.”
“I'm under orders not to tell you, but don't worry your new life is an attractive and younger than you” Tina said with a wink as she once again left you alone.

“I'm still attractive Robert muttered to himself as he stripped off his clothes. Naked Robert looked as his physique in the mirror of the room. I'm still well built. I may not have solid abs anymore but I'm 46, the fact I don't have a large gut period is impressive. Besides I still have it where it counts.” Robert said to himself as he looked below his small gut and smiled.

Realizing he had probably been staring at himself a little too long, Robert hastily put on the hospital robe and when to the chair in the center of the room to wait for Tina.

Shortly after Tina came back in and smiled at Robert. “everything is all set Mr. Hale. I hope you enjoy your vacation. Go ahead and close your eyes the process will start shortly and be over before you know ….”
Robert heard Tina's voice drift away as he felt a sucking motion in his body as his essence was pulled from his body and everything faded to black.

142211112.content:
Tina initiated the swap and monitored the controls. “things are going well for my first swap without the help of a senior official. I love working here at the nexus, Tina has a great gig. Or I should say I have a great gig.” Tina thought to herself as she watched the swap happen. Suddenly a small spike of energy caused one of the dials on the swapping device to increase. Looking down Tina realized to late that the settings where off and that a little bit more than Robert's life was going to be swapped. “I'd better go get an administrator,” Tina thought as she realized Robert was going to get a new body as well as life.

Does Robert recognize his new life (someone connected to Lisa)
Robert has no clue who he is
142211112.title: Something happened, Robert has a new life and body

1422111121.content:
“Mr. Hale can you hear me.” Robert heard Tina's voice call out to him. Robert's eyes fluttered open and he groaned.
Mr. Hale there has been a slight adjustment to our plan. We had an abnormality and we swapped a little more than just your life. We swapped your body as well.
Barely comprehending what was being said, Robert sat up. “Wait what?”
“Don't worry it is reversible, we just can't reverse it until it is time for you to resume being Robert Hale else we risk swapping undesired things.”
still disorientated Robert glanced around, “wait so your saying not only am I in some kids life but I have their body as well?”
“yes” said a women Robert now noticed was standing next to Tina. “I am one of the Directors here at the Nexus, I want to assure you that everything is going to be fine. We can reverse the swap but as Tina said, we must wait until you are to swap back to assure everything is properly put in its place, keeping all your eggs in the proper basket if you will. But to rectify the situation the nexus will provide you with a stipend to help cover any cost not paid for by your company on your vacation. And we will give you a free rental voucher that you may redeem anytime after your vacation.”

“that's... That is very generous of you director” Robert said. “thank you.”
“Tina, go and bring Mr. Hale his new belongings and clothes. His vacation is starting and Im sure he will want some time to adjust before he leaves on his actual vacation.” the director said as she left the room.

“Yes ma'am” Tina replied. Looking at Robert she said, “I'll be right back... again” and she left.

Robert looked around the room and stood up. His legs a little shaky he started towards the mirror.
Once arriving to see his reflection, his mouth dropped. “I'm.... I'm.... I know who I am, I'm in _____ body. Oh boy this is going to be an interesting few weeks” he thought as his knees began to buckle and he passed out.

Tom Anderson: Age 18, is Lisa's on again / off again boyfriend. Currently off after Tom told her she shouldn't worry about getting the money to pay for college because there's no point of her going to school if she's going to stay home and take care of the kids. Tom will be attending the same college as Lisa plans to, but is attending on a foot ball scholarship. He stands 6'3", well muscled and is handsome in a 'rugged' kind of way.

142212.title: Tom Anderson/ Another Choice

1422121.content:
Please Lisa answer my call, please answer, please. Tom muttered to himself as he tried to call is currently ex-girlfriend. “I wasn't trying to make her mad. I why doesn't she understand? All I said was she doesn't need to worry about money, or paying for college, because she wont need to go to college. I'll take care of it all. She can stay home and raise our future kids. I thought she would like the idea of a future where she wouldn't have to worry. But noooo.”

“You don't know anything Tom,” she had said. “You don't know how stressful that life can be Tom. Always picking up the pieces, both metaphorical and once I have children, literal pieces. I've seen my mom struggle with that kind of life, Tom, I want to do something more. Until you can understand that, I think we need to take a break.” she had said as she stormed out of Toms room.

“Get it together, Tom”he whispered to himself. “You can do this, you are strong, in control, confident. You're Tom Anderson handsome all-star Running-Back. You're.....”

“Tom Anderson. A nurse called. “We are ready for you now Mr. Anderson, If you would please come this way.” The nurse standing by the double doors in the back of the lobby area said.

“My name is Tina,” Tina said as Tom got up from his seat and walked towards her. “right this way,” she gestured down a hall way. “Is this your first time using our facility”

“Yes” Tom answered, suddenly nervous, all his self posturing forgotten.

Tina smiled as she asked “ I see you wish to rent a life?” Knowing full well Tom was here to rent a life, but asking the question never hurt and small talk helped narrow down what kind of life her clients were looking for.

“um, Yes. My girlfriend, or ex-girlfriend for the moment, says I don't understand her and she doesn't like the kind of life I told her she could have. I'm not sure if a experiencing someone else's life would help me but I thought... maybe... I could understand her position or something. Or I could see what she was talking about and she what she is so afraid of. I could convince her from experience. I don't know, I'm nervous and anxious being here.”

“He's a bit of an ass, but there has been much worse people who have come thru here and it does look like he is trying. Maybe a rough home-life? Ah, yes a super macho father figure, that explains it” Tina thought as she opened her portfolio of Tom. “We have quite a selection in our catalog. Are there any parameters you want to search by? We can search, gender, race, age, lifestyles..”

“Can you search based around proximity to someone life? Tom interrupted

“it is a little unusual but what do you have in mind?” Tina answered, smiling as she thought she knew what he was thinking.

“Can I search based around Lisa Hale's life.”

“Ah, I knew it” Tina smugly grinned to herself. “Ordinary no we can't just search people of the street and see if they have anyone close to them that is apart of the nexus, But as Miss Hale is in our system already we can narrow parameters down to people she is relatively close to, who are also apart of the nexus. Please have a seat in this waiting room and I will go grab the profile folders of those close to Miss Hale and are currently renting out their lives.”

Tom entered the little waiting room, “It looks more like an Interrogation room” Thought Tom with it's four chairs placed on either side of a table.

“Can I really go through with this?” Tom thought, “ I mean renting someones life, that's pretty radical. It is also so very expensive. I guess I can afford it though, all the money I saved for my first year at college will be sucked dry but with my football scholarship I don't need it. And if it will help me win back Lisa I think its worth it. She is so hot, much hotter than the other cheerleaders i've been with. And she is smart, and funny. Actually has a personality and has a bright future. I just want her future to include me.

The door to the waiting room opened and Tom jumped in his seat. Tina came in smiling. “She has a pretty smile.” Tom thought as she lay several folders onto the table.

“You're in luck Tom,” Tina said. “ There are several options available to you, here,” she handed you several folders. “Would you like to take a look?
1422121.title: Tom

14221211.content:
Tom looked through the dossiers that were given to him. He immediately put the ones with names of Lisas school friends away. It was their last summer vacation after all and he had no idea if her friends were in town or not. He was doing this for his and Lisas relationship and it would definitely not help if he was stuck on a family vacation in another state or something like that. No, he wanted to get closer to Lisa again and with his budget he could only afford a week, therefore he had to be near Lisa.

Tom looked at the one folder with the name "Megan Rhodes" written on it. The two were close friends and he would probably get to know even the darkest of secrets but again he could not be sure if she was in town.

He looked at the remaining folders and was surprised that almost Lisas whole family was registered at the Nexus.

"Not her father though...", thought Tom. "Well, he probably is too busy with his work to do something like this. But come to think of it, there really are many people I know registered here. Did everyone but me know this place?"

"So, which one will it be?", asked Tina. "I know this decision can be quite hard."

"Yeah...", mumbled Tom absentmindedly while looking at the three folders before him.

He could rent the life of Lisas brother Martin. That way he could stay a guy. But Tom vaguely remembered that Lisa once told him that she distanced herself from her brother. He was always getting her in trouble and she could not take that anymore.

Then there was the possibility of renting Stephanie Hales life. He saw Stephanie quite a lot when he was over to Lisas place. She was annoyingly clingy towards Lisa and almost always interrupted the two when they got down to business. With her life he could probably get really close to Lisa but does he really want to be a 14-year-old girl?

Last but not least there was the folder of Elizabeth Hale, Lisas mother. Lisa mentioned something about her mother living the life he wanted for her. He could not understand what Lisa meant when she said her mother struggled through this life. It seemed impossible for him that there would be any kind of trouble for Lisas mother. She had a loving husband who works so hard for her and her family! She can concentrate on her family and her life without having to worry about anything related to work!



In the end Tom decided to rent the life of...
14221211.title: family

142212112.content: Tom was about to select Stephanies life when he noticed something he missed before a file on Lisa. "This is great" Tom thought what better way to understand someone than to be them. On the other hand Lisa would know I was in her life because she would be in mine.
142212112.title: Stephanie Hale

142212113.content:
I think I'll choose to rent the life of Elisabeth Hale.", Tom finally said after some careful thinking.

Tina nodded and gathered the folders that were laying on the table.

"Alright. I'll arrange everything. We'll contact Mrs. Hale immediately and she will get here as soon as possible. This might take up to a day depending whether she is available right now or not. It could ruin the life renting experience if someone found out that you switched lives just because Mrs. Hale suddenly ran out of an important meeting for example.", she explained.

"Er...yeah... I see...", mumbled Tom. He thought he could get over this as soon as possible. The more time passed the more time he had to think about this decision. He really did not want to live the life of a middle-aged woman!

"But I have to do this... For Lisa and me...", he said to himself every time these thoughts came up.

While Tina was arranging everything, Tom was brought to the lobby where he had to wait for further instructions. If the timing was bad he had to come back tomorrow.

He was looking around the room, trying to forget his doubts.

"Did I really just throw away a lot of money to rent the life of my girlfriends, well ex-girlfriends, mother?"

He saw a woman around the age of 40 walking towards the back end. She was slightly overweight and was wearing a red sweater, gray yoga pants and black flat shoes. She had her dirty blond hair in a ponytail.

"That's a different door than the one I went in... So, she probably is letting her life be rented. I wonder why someone would choose her?", thought Tom. "I certainly wouldn't."

After what seemed like an eternity where Tom looked at all the people in the lobby and thought about who's life he would or would not rent, Tina returned to him with some good news.

"Sorry that you had to wait so long. We had a bit of trouble and... Never mind, you don't want to hear this stuff. Anyways, I contacted Mrs. Hale right after we departed and she said she would be here in an hour, so she should be here any minute now.", explained Tina. "So please follow me. You can get ready so we can start the procedure as soon as possible. Because today is almost over I managed to arrange that you won't be charged for today."

"Thanks... I guess... That's very kind of you.", replied Tom. He suddenly felt dizzy because everything was happening so fast now after the long waiting time.

"Don't mention it", she smiled. "I know you're on a tight budget. Also, I hope you might enjoy this so much that you might consider offering your life for rental in the future. Your life as a running-back with a scholarship might interest quite a few people."

"I'll er... think about it...", replied Tom hesitantly. He really did not want his life to be lived by other people. Well, technically Elisabeth would be living his life for a week but this was a necessary evil. Also, now he could choose who would live his life, if he agreed to this he could not.

Tina nodded. "We'll talk about this after your 'vacation'. But remember, this 'job' is paid very well, especially for someone like you."

The two went silent for the rest of the walk into a cold room with a futuristic looking couch in the middle surrounded by strange symbols on the ground. Tom really began to get cold feet. Was this really the right decision?

"For Lisa and me... I do this for our future...", he said slowly while taking a deep breath.

"Please take off your clothes and put this hospital gown on.", said Tina and handed him over a white gown.

"Okay..." Tom began to take off his clothes and fortunately Tina turned around and made some notes on her clipboard.

"Great... This is one of these wonderful hospital gowns that don't cover your behind", sighed Tim when he finished getting dressed.

"It's only temporary. Now please lay down on the couch. We can't start right now, we still have to wait for Mrs. Hale to get ready but I think you prefer laying down on this comfortable couch."

Tom nodded and did as he was told.

"Okay, as soon as I get the go, I will lower this clear shield and the magic will take place. It will be a bit disorientating but don't worry it won't hurt a bit. When everything is done, I'll be back with the belonging of Mrs. Hale and we will get over the final details.", explained Tina and started to look at her smartphone.

"I do this for Lisa and me... I do this for Lisa and me...", mumbled Tom over and over again in order to refrain him from just getting up and walking away. He would not have thought that this would freak him out so much. But then again, he would have preferred not to swap with a woman but considering Lisas relationship with her brother it did not seem like a good solution.

"I'm just nervous because I am going to be a woman for a week... Lisas mother to be precise... But this will be for the best. I can get back with Lisa", he thought.

Several minutes later Tina finally received the message that they could start and lowered the clear shield.

"It starts now. When you wake up, everything will be over", said Tina and left the room. As soon as the door had closed lights began flashing before Toms eyes and soon he was drifting into a deep sleep.
142212113.title: Elisabeth Hale

1422121131.content:
"And everything is over now", said a voice that Tom recognized as Tina's beside him.

"What? Already? But I just laid down a moment ago!", Tom said as the clear shield that was over him retreated.

"Well, you actually were lying here for about an hour. During the transfer you are asleep and your conscious is, let's say, shut off. The download of the necessary skills and the identity transfer combined with all the reality altering stuff would be too much for your mind. You don't want to know what would happen to you if you were wide awake during the transfer", explained Tina calmly and put some clothes besides Tom. "These are your clothes for the time being by the way."

Tom, who had just sat up when Tina put the clothes down, looked around. "My chest feels kinda... heavy...", he said slowly and patted his chest but could not find anything that might cause this feeling.

"Yes, this is a side effect. You see, you have all the skills that come with the life you rented. There also come some things that you would feel that the original owner of that life would feel. For example this heavy feeling on your chest is caused by your breasts. You can't see them but they are there. It's because of some complicated magical stuff I don't want to bore you but basically you can only see Mrs. Hales body when you look in reflections", continued Tina. "And I think it would be the best if you start to dress in your clothes."

Slowly Tom reached towards the clothes and grabbed the white bra that was sitting on top of them. "I have to wear this now...", he mumbled and turned around the foreign object in front of him.

"Yes, as you do. You are Elisabeth Hale for the world now. Even though I know you are really not her, it is all I can see right now. Well, this is not completely true as Mrs. Hale will see you as you see yourself right now and vice versa. We are not sure why this is but my best guess is because you are connected through the transfer."

Tom nodded but did not really listen to her after she said that he had to wear a bra now.

"Was it really the right thing to do?", he thought. "It's too late now anyways, I have to get through this now."

Tina noticed how he stared helplessly at the bra. "Don't worry it will be no problem for you to put it on. As I said you have all the necessary skills required for your rented life. No memories mind you, so you will not be able to recall anything related to this life. But don't worry, I have a folder here with everything you'll need to know or at least what Mrs. Hale thinks you need to know."

Tom nodded again slowly, stood up and took off his hospital gown. This time he did not really care if Tina was looking or not, all the different feeling he got right now where too much for him. When he put the gown on the couch and grabbed the bra he looked over to Tina and felt as if something was different than before.

Tina noticed his look and explained with a smile: "Ah yes, another modification. You are now the same height as Mrs. Hale."

"I see", he nodded and began putting on the bra. It was surprisingly easy! "This feels like I have done this for years, no decades!"

"Well, you do. Remember you are Elisabeth Hale now. Should I address you with Elisabeth or Mrs. Hale by the way?", Tina asked him.

"I'd prefer Tom", he answered her.

"No no no!", frowned Tina. "You are Elisabeth Hale now and therefore people will call you that. You have to get used to that, at least until you transfer back."

Tom sighed deeply while grabbing the white granny panties next. "Then I guess Elisabeth should do... Mrs. Hale just sounds even more surreal."

Tina nodded and went back to her previous smile. "Okay Elisabeth. Your shoes are standing right beside you, I hung your purse at the door knob. I leave you to yourself for now. Get dressed and look into the folder I just gave you. There is everything the original Mrs. Hale thinks you need to know. Don't worry you can take it with you, we don't expect you to memorize everything in it in just this short time. When you are finished just press the button next to the door and I'll get you and walk you out."

With that she left the room. Tom was now standing in the room with just panties and a bra.

"It really is done...", he said to himself and sighed. "What have I brought on myself? Well, there is no turning back now and I really hope this helps me win back Lisa and hopefully win her back once and for all."

He continued dressing by putting on the pink blouse. Normally he would not be caught dead in something like this. "But nobody will notice, right?"

All of this was so surreal for Tom and a small part of him believed that all this was just some kind of elaborate prank to shoot photos of him in women's clothing. "But the heavy feeling on my chest got reduced when I put on the bra. Just as if 'my breasts' got support. Would it be really possible to fake something like that?"

Shrugging his doubts off, he continued dressing by stepping into the blue skirt and last but not least put on the black pumps. "I hope she is really right with this skills stuff... Otherwise I will possibly sprain my ankle.", he thought still doubting that any of this was real. After a few steps his fears had disappeared. Just like with the bra it felt as if he had been walking in heels for years!

Tom then looked at the folder Tina gave him and skimmed through it. "I read this more thoroughly when I am gone from here. This room really creeps me out somehow."

He went over to the door, grabbed the hanging purse and slung it over his should and then pressed the button. A few moments later the door was opened again by Tina.

"Looking good, Elisabeth.", she smiled at him. Tom cringed slightly when he heard that name. It would be really hard to get used to this.

"I have made some arrangements and I have to say that we normally don't do this. I've kind of taken a liking to you.", she winked at him. "Anyways, if you want you can meet the original Mrs. Hale. No long talk or anything. Usually we forbid the contact but I pulled some strings for you. Of course, you don't have to accept my offer."

Tom thought about it for a moment and decided to...
1422121131.title: Follow Tom as Elisabeth

choices: His cellphone rings during the drive
14221211312.content:
"Erm... yeah... No thank you, I really appreciate the offer but I think our first meeting after this is all over will be awkward enough. I don't really need that right now.", he explained.

Tina nodded. "Okay, as you wish. If you would follow me now, Elisabeth. I'll guide you to your car."

The both of them walked silently side by side to the garage. The click clacks of Toms heels echoed through the corridor, his skirt was swishing back and forth on his legs.

Soon the two arrived in the underground parking garage. He immediately walked over to where he parked his car earlier this morning.

"Where are you going Elisabeth?", asked Tina slightly amused.

"To my car? I parked it over there", Tom explained to her confused.

"No, TOM parked his car over there. YOUR car is over here ELISABETH", replied Tina and emphasized the names purposely.

"Yeah... You're right...", he sighed and followed Tina to the family car of the Hales. He had never driven it himself before but the original Elisabeth drove him and Lisa this one time when his old car did not want to start. "And now this is my car... At least for the next week."

"If you don't have any more questions, then that's it. I'll see you again in a week to swap back. If you might encounter any problems you can of course come back here and we can help. It is very important for us to provide the best service for our customers."

"Yeah, thank you.", he replied and got into the car. He was surprised that the seat was already in the correct position as well as the mirrors but then he remembered the height change. "Even without it, there would probably be some kind of magic something for that.", he thought as he rummaged through his purse to get the keys. The engine started and it felt like he had driven this car before.

"Drive safely.", waved Tina goodbye as he drove out of the garage.
14221211312.title: Just leave the building

choices: Lisa returned with Megan, having forgotten something
142212113121.content:
It was an uneventful ride to 'his' home. Tom did not even notice or question why he somehow knew the way there or how he was able to drive in heels so effortlessly. He was getting used to the changes and everything unnatural was normal now.

Pulling into the drive way, Tom just saw Lisa leaving with Megan. "They're probably going to the mall or something", he thought as he killed the engine. His gaze went to the rearview mirror when he jumped shocked.

"Mrs. Hale?", he asked in surprise and turned around but no one was sitting behind him. He looked back in the mirror and again saw Elisabeth Hale in it. She had the same confused expression that he had.

"Wait a minute...", he mumbled and saw that Elisabeths lips were forming the same words he said.

"Tina did not tell me about this. Well, I guess she kinda did... Something about seeing me as Elisabeth... Still, she could have warned me that I would be seeing her in the mirror!", he thought as he got out of the car.

Tom click clacked over to the front door and was searching his pockets for the keys. Unfortunately neither his blouse nor his skirt had any pockets. "Dammit! Where are the keys?", he asked himself furiously but then immediately remembered the purse he forgot in the car. In it he found the keys and got into the house.

He quickly got rid of the shoes. They were beginning to hurt his feet. Throwing the purse on the couch he sat himself beside it and got the folder Tina gave him out of it.

"Well, I guess I should read some things about my current life before I embarrass myself with some minor details I don't know", he thought. He guessed normally clients of the Nexus would insepct the house but he had been here a dozen times so no need for that and since he was alone he did not have anything else to do.

Opening the folder he began to read the first page but was interrupted before finishing the first paragraph.
