People bustled around the waiting room of The Nexus as clients and renters where assigned and led through the side door of the waiting room. Moments later reemerging, sometimes with a new awkwardness and others with a sense of confidence and renewed vitality.

A women in scrubs and holding a clipboard walked out the side door. "we are ready for you now Mr. Monet. If you would please come this way" she said. Getting up out of the waiting-room chair Matthew followed the women in Scrubs.

A little on the portly side, Matthew had signed up to rent his body an hour after he quit his dead end retail job of 7 years. They walked in akward silence until the woman lead Matthew to a desk and sat behind it.

"I assume that you called me in because someones interested in my body?" Matthew asked tentatively.

The woman who pulled out a file and opened it on the desk said "Thats actually the problem, no one in the short term catagory was interested in you."

"Short term? So that means ther are other options were people are interested? "

"Correct, a mid term swap last between 2 months and a year. There was some interest here from a fitness program that rents overweight bodies to slim down and use in advertising. Obviously you would have to sign additional paperwork for that one."

"Not a bad choice but what else do you have?"

"That was the only option were someone was expressly looking at renting you, but there are some feilds with such low numbers of renters that most people are needed, all of these require a 1 year contract minimumand barring the first you will move from one body to the next."

"Ok, what are these options?"

"A long term swap is anything over a year, a handi swap is where someone with a disability or cronic disease (usually) temporarily swaps with a able bodied renter, a maternity swap has you swapping with expectant mothers to give birth. I'll be frank with you, if there wasn't such a desperate need for renters in this area we wouldn't be offering it to any male. Finally is a life purchase, were one of our (usually older) clients permanently takes your body."

"I'll go with a...
14221223.title: Matthew Monet

choices: Enter Jessie Miller 18 year old first time mother
Enter Lauran Daniels 40 year old mother
142212234.content:
"Can you tell me a little kore about the Maternity swap?" Matthew asked curiously.

Looking supprised the nurse says "We house your body in a luxury spa for the year while your mind is put in various women and should stay in any given body for about a week, two at the longest. You will be required to give birth and begin recovery. There will be a strict diet with some varriations between bodies. Unlike other options with Maternity Swaps you will notice physical differences, for safety reasons you need to know the bounds of the body you're in, so while you still see your facial features and skin tone but otherwise you will see your current body."

"Like reskining a 3d model?"

"Correct. Lastly the pay is one million plus fifty grand per baby you deliver." The nurse finished "now do you have any questions?"

"Just where do I sign?" Matthew asked nervously.

The nurse looked genuinely supprised by his answer and pulled out a stack of forms and without hesitation Matthew started to signe.

"Thats excellent" the nurse started "but due to the low number of volunteers you will be kept busy."

Matthew knew the next 12 months were going to be rough, but he tried to picture the money that he would make. "Women have been giving birth since the beginning of time, I'm sure I'll find a way to manage." Matthew thought to himself to bolster his confidence. After signing all the paperwork, he asked "So when do I start and who will I be a surrogate for first?"

"Immediately. I notified our first client while you were signing the paperwork. She should be here in a couple hours. In the meantime, I'll take you to your transference room where you can watch a company video about the program. All clients are anonymously drawn for you on a first come, first serve basis." The nurse told Matthew before leading him down a long hall and into an elevator before guiding him to a room with a projector and an open glass tube.

"Watch the informational video, change into these" the nurse pulled out a plastic wrapped set of white linnen pajamas, "and when the videos done get in the pod. Your body will be transferred to the resort and you'll wake up in about 40 minutes a whole new woman." She chuckled at her own joke. "
The nurse left and the video started, he quickly changed into the provided cloths and watched the video which seemed to keep going. When it eventually ended he took a deep breath and entered the tube which closed on him, before quickly blacking out.
142212234.title: Maternity Swap

1422122341.content:
Matthew woke up in a near identical tube in a different room, the biggest difference was it was lying down instead of standing up. Not ready to look at his body he stayed lying down and looked at the room which housed houses various medical equipment that all seemed oddly large.

After a few moments a nurse came in amd manually opened the tube. "Good evening Mr. Monet, I'm Stacey and we'll get to know each other well over the next year, how are you feeling?"

"Scared" Matthew started suprised to hear his own voice, even if something seemed off about it "don't get me wrong I'm more than willing, I mean I wouldn't have agreed if I didn't think I could do it but the money kind of gave me tunnel vision."

With a gentle smile Stacey brushed Matthews hair back "It'll be alright, women have been doing this since the beginning. And I'm sure before long you'll be an old pro."

Feeling a little comforted Matthew expressed his most immediate fear "Oh I'm sure I'll be worried about that closer to the bir time but right now I'm worried about seeing my body. All the brochures said we continue to see our own bodies for our mental wellbeing and the thing that drew me to maternity was that this is the exception. But being here I'm a little scared."

"It'll be ok. You're not going to be in one body long enough for that to manifest. They're probably be some disorientation but thats it."

"Ok, can you help me up?" Matthew said finally allowing himself to concentrate on his body. He somehow felt both lighter and heavier at the same time, his crotch felt off and his back was hurting.

Stacey helped him out of the tune and onto a standard hospital bed, as Matthew realized he was only wearing a hospital gown. Still not ready to look down he waited as Stacey ran a number of tests including clipping a blood pressure sensor to his finger and attaching electrodes.

After a while Stacey called an orderly to help move Matthew down the hall to his room. Once there Stacey said she'd get him something to drink and left with the orderly.

Matthew finally looked down at himself and was mildly surprised to see pink polkadots covering his chest which went out way to far, unable to make out much past the large pink polkadot bump that was his stomach he lifted his leg to find it shaved and a matching shade of pink on his toes, he ran his hands down his body next first finding his hair went to mid back then amazed by how sensitive not just his breasts were but his skin in general, the void he felt between his legs was an odd sensation and he felt over stuffed just thinking about it.

Stacey came back in with some water and showed Matthew srond the room. A tablet was provided that could be used to call the nurses, control the giant tv, order food and much more.

Feeling a pressure on his bladder, Matthew gets Stacey to show him the bathroom which was a large ensuite. Looking in the mirror he was relieved to see his own face even if the rest of his body was unfamiliar in everything but skin tone "good thing all the rules seem to be reversed for maternity" he thought as he carefully sat down to pee, lifting his gown up in the process. After overthinking it for a while his body reached its breaking point and pee began to dribble out, now feeling what was used he pushed the rest out before struggling to wipe himself dry.

"This isn't so hard" he thought as he struggled to get up. Retuning to his bed after he washed his hands
1422122341.title: Enter Jessie Miller 18 year old first time mother

14221223413.content:
Returning to his bed Matthew no sooner gets in then he feels a gush of liquid, though it didn't feel like peeing. Embarrassed he uses the tablet to call the nurse.

Stacey quickly enters the room to find out whats happened. Face beet red Matthew says "I think I had an accident in the bed."

"It's alright dear" she says as she quickly and efficieny cha ges the sheets before examining the wet spot. "This isn't urine its your mucus plug. Congratulations you're in labor."

Matthew felt his stomach sink at that, he thought he'd atleast have a few hours to adjust to being a woman before having to experience child birth.

"Hop up on the bed" Stacey says as she pulls up stirrups from the side, we'll see how dialated you are."
14221223413.title: His water breaks

choices: Matthew doesn't want to leave Hanna
142212234134.content:
Hours later an exhausted Matthew sits in the bed, breastfeeding a healthy baby girl. Something had been irreparably broke in Matthew durring this experience of labor, holding and feeding the baby, the sense of masculinity had shattered leaving Matthew's mind in a feminine state.

She held the baby girl securely as she drank her fill. "So I'm guessing I don't get to name her." Matthew asked wanting to call the baby something else.


"No your bodys owner provided a name, Hanna Abigail Miller." Stacey said.

"Thats a horrible choice, her initials spell HAM."

Stacey snorted at that as Matthew finished breastfeeding. Hanna was put in a cot and left in the room while Matthew went to sleep.
142212234134.title: Skip forward

choices: Go with the Anonymous Music star
142212235.content:
“I’ll go with a life purchase!” Matthew told the woman from The Nexus. After 7 years working at a dead-end job and whole lifetime of being just about average he had figured renting out his body might jumpstart his life a bit. The shorter term options sounded interesting, but he hadn’t known that leaving his life behind might be on the table too. “Well, I must caution you that this is a very significant decision. A life purchase means you will assume the buyer’s life in it’s entirety, their responsibilities, families, etc.”

“I would’ve thought you’d try to talk me into it, not out.”

“The Nexus routinely carries out rentals on a daily basis, we pride ourselves on our transparency and good business practices,” the Nexus representative informed Matthew. “In other words you’d rather not get sued?” he asked, seeing through the corporate talk that he’d become so used to at his last job. The lady simply returned a noncommittal smile. Matthew knew her type, they were polished to a fault and would stick to the script no matter what. “If you ultimately decide to go ahead with the Life Purchase the Nexus will make sure to transfer enough of each participant’s skills, mannerisms, and so on in order for both to function in your new lives. You will both sign a legally binding contract through which you both agree to take on the other’s life and body and to relinquish all claims on your original ones. Do you understand, Mr. Monet?” she asked, her smile never wavering for a moment.

“Yes, I think so,” Matthew nodded. “Good, I have a few interested buyers for you to review,” she handed him a set of folders:

1. Allison McNair: 58 year old, Caucasian female. An aging socialite who made millions from a series of divorces to powerful men. She had been stunning in her youth, but had resorted to significant plastic surgery in order to cling to her fading beauty. She had impressively enhanced breasts and butt, with the characteristic signs of cosmetic surgery all over her face. If Matthew sold his life to her he would inherit her fortune minus a few million she would transfer to her new life in order to experience life a powerful man like her husbands had been.
2. Patricia “Patty” Williams: 64 year old, female of African descent. The matriarch of a sprawling family. She lost her husband when her 5 children were little and raised them on her own. She’s a singer in her church choir and very devoted to her church, her children and grandchildren. After a lifetime of keeping her family together she feels she feels she would like another shot at life, but wants to have someone continue to watch over her family.
3. REDACTED: The buyer prefers to stay anonymous until the seller agrees and signs a separate confidentiality agreement. The are a famous music star at the peak of their fame. They have money, fame and hordes of adoring fans. However, they have a heavy addiction problem and want to leave that life behind without having to deal with any of the consequences or the withdrawal. Matthew would have to deal with the addiction.
There are a few more folders to review and Matthew decides to …
142212235.title: Life purchase

1422122353.content:
"If I go with the Anonymous will I find out who it is before we switch lives?" Matthew asked hopefully.

"Unfortunately we cannot do that' The woman said with false regret oozing from her. "Someone could back out after they learn the information and once past the point of no return you wont be able to focus on the information."

"Well, that settles it" Matthew says resigned "My curiosity has gotten the better of me so I'll go with the Anonymous Celebrity."

"Good, good, follow me."

"I don't suppose you could atleast tell me what sex I'll be?"

The woman just shakes her head. Sighing Matthew follows her down a hall and up a flight of stairs. He's lead to a private room that looks like half a hospital room half mission control center with a futuristic coffin with a glass top instead of a bed.

He's presented with some extra paper work related to permanent selling of a life before stripping out of his cloths, laying in the coffin, covering himself with a thin green sheet and pressing a button so the door to the coffin closes.

An alarm then comes from the coffin signaling that the transfer team can enter. He watches as they swarm around the room some on the computers some around the coffin. It only goes on for about 5 minutes before Matthew drifts off.

An unknown amount of time later
.

Matthew wakes up in seemingly the same room, the only thing perceptibly different is the sheet covering him is red. The coffin opens and Matthew steps out, theres supposed to be a mirror in the corner but from the rules explained when he signed up he's not allowed to look yet. He cautiously looks around and finds the Nexus provided pajamas he'll be wearing if he doesn't want to go around naked for the time being. Feeling a little wobbly from a different mass he slowly puts one leg in then the other before pulling the pants up, and following it with the tshirt. He then pressed the call button and a different woman entered the room.

"Hello Mr. Monet how are you feeling? " she said with a kind voice and a smile.

"A little unsteady I'll admit" Matthew felt at ease with the woman as he continued "I know you're going to ease me into my new identity but I'd like to know something besides the fact I'm apparently a famous musician and have a big problem with addiction."

"Well now that it's your body I can tell you something. "

<sorry for the basic options I don't follow celebrities enough to know what are good options>
1422122353.title: Go with the Anonymous Music star

14221223531.content:
"Well now that it's your body I can tell you that you're a teenage" the woman started

"How bad did he screw up that he's given away his life?" Matthew interupts.

"Well first off Mr. Monet from what I know they were never comfortable with their celebrity and it was the stresses of that that had them turn to drugs as a coping mechanism." the woman said with a scolding tone "Secondly you are making assumptions about your body."

"I'm sorry" Matthew said realizing he had no right to judge this kid yet not without the minimal information he had, plus he probably got scared and ran a natural if immature reaction. It was at this point he realized that he hadn't asked the woman for a name. "I'm sorry I didn't get your name."

"You can call me Kara" she started "and as I was saying you're a former child actress and teenage pop sensation."

"Did you say actress?" Matthew asked latching onto that word.

"I did, go ahead and check." Kara offered as she turned around.

Pulling his pants with his left hand Matthew saw his familiar member sitting there, with his right hand he grabbed for it and found nothing.

"That's part of the magic, you see your old body. Atleast at first as you acclimatize to your new self you should see more and more of the new you. This does take a long time for most, and most of our business is short terms so we don't usually need to bring it up."

Matthew pulled his fist away and saw his imaginary member still sitting there. His throat going dry he said "you can turn around now, how old am I anyway?"
14221223531.title: Child actor turned singing sensation

142212235311.content:
“You are 10, dear,” the Nexus attendant said in a kindly voice. “My daughter loves your music, by the way.” You blushed, unsure of what you should say to that. “I mean, she loves Ms. Luna’s music,” she corrected herself. “Luna? You mean, as in Thalia Luna? The one who took her top off at that award ceremony a couple of weeks ago?” you asked incredulously. “Yup, the one and only. I’m glad I didn’t let my daughter see that show, but Luna’s music is pretty good, I have to say. Now, would you like me to help you get dressed before your driver comes to pick you up, Ms. Luna?”

You nod silently, too shocked at the realization of who you’d become to say anything. Luna had been in the spotlight since she was in her early teens. You hadn’t been an avid fan, but pretty much everyone had heard her music at some point. She used to have a TV show in one of the kids’ networks, but had tried really hard to shed her squeaky clean image over the last couple of years.

“Here, because of the nature of your new life Nexus is providing you with a small mirror that will show you what you look like to the rest of the world. Like I said, it’ll take some time before what you see reflected in most mirrors is what others see,” she said, pointing at the mirror you had first seen your new self in. “This one,” she handed you a compact mirror, the sort that women used for makeup, “ will show you what others see right away, since your image is important to your new life Nexus is giving you a way to work around the acclimating process. Don’t lose it though, it’s very special.”

You nodded again, taking a peak at your reflection in the handheld mirror. The woman staring back at you was gorgeous. She had a youthful look, but it was obvious she was well on her way to becoming a stunning beauty. It was hard to believe you were the one animating that face.

choices: A talk with the original Thalia Luna
1422122353111.content:
"Yes, I'd like you to help me get dressed." Matthew said tryin to focus on the basic fact he was a woman now before he was anywhere near ready to deal with being famous.

Kara pulled out a grey tub identical to the one Matthew put his clothes in. Expecting something very feminine, to help drive the point home he was a woman now, he was actually dissapointed at the cloths. Boyshorts, thay admittedly seemed way too small, went on with ease. A sports bra came next that Kara helped adjust, they were feminine but not overly so.

"Can I look at myself in the mirror?" Matthew abruptly asked.

"It should be fine" was Kara's response leading the way to the mirror. Matthew didn't know what he was expecting, but he just saw himself in a sports bra and panties that felt surprisingly comfortable. Shaking his head he asked for the next item, black sweat pants another thing that looked too small but stepping into them infront of the mirror he saw them strech in a way that didn't seem right. A solid red tshirt came next that seemed the most feminine of all the cloths, and had low neckline. A grey hoodie came next, and after it was zipped up Kara used a provided hairband to pull back unseen locks into a ponytail.

"It's gonna be a problem if I can't see my hair." Matthew pointed out.

"I may have oversimplified before, hair is the exception to the acclimatization process, you should see it before the end of the day. It's, as you stated, a practical necessity but waking up with different hair would be distressing." Kara said pulling out a baseball cap, opening the back and closing it around the ponytail.

After putting the last item, a pair of sunglasses on Matthew asked if he needed to do anything else and was informed that there was one last item before he could leave.
1422122353111.title: More at the Nexus

142212235315.content: How old is Matthew now?
142212235315.title: Matthews new age

choices: Matthew has to go to the bathroom
1422122353153.content:
Expecting this the nurse walks over to a bed side table and starts to pour a cup of water, before saying "You are 13 dear."

"How was this person able to leave their life at 13?" Matthew asked confused as the nurse made her way back.

"That would be too much information at once" she said as she handed over the cup of water. Oddly even thought Matthew felt like he had to look down at Kara, he had to reach up for the large cup.

After talking for a little while longer Kara left Matthew to adjust. The sensation was odd to Matthew who would reach for something only to realize it was higher then it seemed, and when he grabbed something it was larger then it should be.

After about 2 hours something happened.

1422122354.content:
Matthew looked through more of the folders.

Victoria Velanova: 28 year old Caucasian female. She had raven dark hair , a bombshell figure and piercing blue eyes. The file said she worked for an international marketing firm and wanted to get away from her life due to personal trauma. However, unbeknownst to you she is actually a foreign spy looking to escape her pursuers.

Jean-Marie Olivier: 22 year old Caucasian female. Heir to a large family fortune and business. She had been groomed all her life to take over for her father, but felt trapped by her family’s demands on her. She feels selling her life and becoming a man is the only way to prove she can build her own destiny outside of her family’s traditions and expectations.

Julia Veltran: 33 year old Latin female. She was the girlfriend of a rich and powerful businessman (actually a mafia boss, but that wasn’t in the file). She wanted to experience life as a man and not be judged solely on her stunning looks.
1422122354.title: Look through more folders

14222.content:
The waiting room was busier than one might expect as both clients, renters and sellers sat and awaited for their turn to be called into the back. Even with the television playing a local knock off of the Maury show and plenty of piles of magazines, almost any observant person could tell that everyone waiting were either anxious or nervous. Once they went into the back, they would reemerge about an hour or so later. Usually walking out with a new awkwardness or with a renewed sense of confidence and vitality.

Tina, an employee in her early thirties wearing scrubs came out the door into the waiting room with a clipboard in her hands. "Ms. _______, we're ready for you if you would come with me into the back" she said. ______ got up out of a chair followed Tina as others watched.


Was it...?

Danika Jones: Age 23, She has lived a very troubled life that led to crime and prison very early in her life. She has brown skin and short black hair in corn rolls. She is 5'6'' and very curvy; she could easily be a stripper if she lost a few pounds. Danika is here to rent or sell her to whomever wants to be young or busty since she has trouble finding a job because of a felony on her record.
.
Kirsten Larsen: Age 43, She a well off woman who has a passion for extreme exploring. At 5'11'', Kirsten has come to realize that she is getting too old to be hiking places like Mount Everest or scaling cliffs in Nepal like she used to. Despite being in excellent shape for her age, she has opted to rent younger bodies that are more capable of weathering the adventure and adrenaline she craves.

or was it another woman?
14222.title: Female

142222.content:
As she got up, Kirsten veiled a grimace on her face as a pang of pain came from her knee. It was the result of a mast spill she had taken on Mt. Kilimanjaro. At her age, she was taking notice of her lengthening recovery time. This was one of the many reasons that she was seeking out a body that could undertake the adventures she loved. Just like renting a car, she needed a body designed for her vacation. "Right here, Ms. Larsen", Tina said, snapping Kirsten out of her head and leading her into a room resembling a place that a doctor would see a patient.
Kirsten's flats cracked as she entered the room. Even without heels, she was a very tall woman sporting a lean, sleek frame. Her black slacks swished with every step that she took, that tail of her black jacket trailing a bit behind her white blouse. Her long hair was a couple shades darker than blonde, making it more of a gold. As she sat down, her hazel eyes observed Tina pulling up a number of files on the computer adjacent to her seat. Kirsten certainly looked her age, but rather than looking old and dumpy, time a weathered her features into a mature profile that simultaneously conveyed curiosity and understanding. However, she still retained a reckless smile when spotting something exciting.
"So, we've narrowed the pool down to two candidates who most closely matched your request", Tina reported.
"Oh?", Kirsten asked, amused.
"The first is Yu Yan Xia", Tina continued, pulling up a picture of a petite Asian woman in a leotard. She look very young, had a round, porcelain face and shorter black hair. "She is 18 years old, five feet tall and weighs 100lbs. Yu Yan was an Olympic Gymnast for the People's Republic of China, meaning that after the procedure, you would have her knowledge in that field. With a smaller body, you would need less food, oxygen and water. You would also gain her expert agility and balance".
Kirsten scratched her chin, "Interesting. You said she's from China, though. Would I lose my ability to speak English by switching with her?".
Tina shook her head, " Not necessarily. If you request, we can leave your linguistic skills unchanged". Tina then proceeded to pull up another profile, "The next candidate is Athena Parker". The next picture was of a black woman in shorts and a track jersey. She had long, black hair, coffee colored skin and full lips. Her quads and glutes were large and thick. "Athena is 25 years old, 5'8 and weighs 140 lbs. She's a former sprinter but still keeps her body in top shape. Athena would be the better option if you're looking to max out your speed and endurance".

Which woman did Kirsten pick?
142222.title: Kirsten Larsen

choices: They swapped more than they bargained for (Body Swap)
1422222.content:
"I'll go with Athena Parker", Kirsten replied. Although Yu Yan certainly had her advantages, Athena looked like an absolute tank. Kirsten thought it would be liberating to power through obstacles in Athena's muscular body.
"Excellent", Tina replied, finalizing the choice on her computer screen, "Go ahead and put on the gown on the table and lie down for me. We'll alert Athena in the next room that you have selected her. Then We'll activate the Nexus and perform the trade".
After Tina exited the room, Kirsten swiftly undressed and adorned herself in the hospital gown and played down on the table. She was almost shaking with nervousness and excitement. After she awakened, she'd have another woman's life. Kirsten had experienced a lot, but nothing quite like this. Tina rendered the room with a tank and mask, "Ms. Larsen, if you could just inhale deeply for me", she said, fitting Kirsten with the mask and loosening the nozzle on the tank. Kirsten did as she was instructed and drowsiness began to set in. "When you wake up, you'll be a whole new woman", these were the last words Kirsten heard before blacking out.

Where do we go from here?
1422222.title: Athena Parker

choices: Meet with Athena in her body
14222223.content:
When Kirsten came to, her brain felt as if it had been through viciously shaken. Her blurry vision slowly began to clarify, turning splotchy colors into a woman in a lab coat in front of her. Glancing over, she abruptly snapped her attention in Kirsten's direction," Oh good, you're awake", she commented, "What is your first and last name?".
"Kirsten Larsen", she responded, perplexed at the sound coming from her throat.
"What is your birthday?".
"February 12th", she answered, becoming much more coherent and concerned about the sound of her voice.
"Ms. Larsen, my name is Emma Nail", the woman continued," First I would like to say that your the Nexus accomplished its task. You now have the life of Miss Athena Parker".
Kirsten slowly nodded, wondering why she was stating the obvious.
"That being said, it switched more than was planned", Emma added.
Kirsten's mind was racing. What could this mean!?
"Though everyone would see you as Miss Parker, you would have retained your body. We don't know the cause, but you now possess Miss Paper's body as well".
Kirsten's eyes bulged. Emma cautiously handed her a hand mirror. Kirsten began to reach for it, already seeing the dark skin that covered her hand and wrist. Sure enough, she was greeted by the reflection of a terrified black woman. The face would have been very pretty, but at the moment it was contorted into a shocked expression.
"I know this must be a lot to take in and we are investigating the cause right now. That being said, you will have to inhabit Athena's body for the time being, possibly for the duration of the swap. We will make this right, Ms. Larsen, we promise". Kirsten remained silent, still taking it all in. "Miss Parker's clothes are on the counter for you to change into. Take all the time you need", with that Emma left the room.
Kirsten slowly got up, and noticed a full length mirror beside her. She timidly crept over, see Athena's full image in a hospital gown. As she approached the reflection, she reached back, untying the gown and letting it drop to the floor. She took in the glory of Athena's dark, defined body, "Certainly not what I'm used to, but I can work with it". Kirsten put her hands on the defined abs, then feeling her thick, rock solid Thighes. She smirked a bit, looking between her legs, "Thank God she shaves". She then made her way back up, feeling her new boobs put of curiosity. They were much smaller and more compact than her own. She flicked one of thesmall, circular nipples, intrigued as it instantly hardened. However, as she looked back, she became enthralled with Athena's physique. Out of curiosity, she flexed her right bicept like Rosie the Riveter, "God, this girl is ripped!", she exclaimed, pulling off poses. After a few frontal flexes, she spun around to show off her back definition. Although her back was quite impressive, that's not what caught her eye. Breaking her pose, Kirsten reached back, making a wax-on-wax-off motion on her left ass check," Oh my", she muttered. It looked big in the picture, but Athena's bulbous behind was absolutely massive in person. Kirsten reached back with her other hand and gave them a squeeze," Solid muscle. There's no flab on this booty". Kirsten then looked over at the pile of clothes," I suppose I have a whole trip with this body. Time to suit up".

What does Kirsten do next?
14222223.title: Body Swap with Athena

info.brief_description: Magic and Science merge to allow people take a vacation with someone else's identity.
info.description:
In a world known to very few, a small company has merged Magic with Technology to offer the ultimate escape from the day to day tedium of life. The opportunity to live someone else's life. The company is known as The Nexus, and the fees they charge for their services are substantial. Half of those fees are paid to carefully recruited volunteers who 'rent' their lives to the company's clients. Those clients range from the very wealthy who can indulge in a guilty pleasure vacation in someone else's life, to the very desperate who would do anything to escape their own life, even if just for a few days.

Characters:

Lisa Hale: Our main character. Age: 18, height 5'7", she is physically fit with B-cup breasts and shoulder length brown hair. She is considered pretty by most, in a very 'active girl' kind of way. In high school, she was involved in cheer leading and dance, as well as cross country. Her family is fairly normal, upper middle class, and Lisa has been a fairly successful student through school. Having just graduated, she is preparing for her last summer vacation before starting college in the fall. She has decided, however, to rent her life out to The Nexus for the summer, as a way to pay for school in the fall.

Martin Hale: Age 16, Lisa's younger brother. He's a 5'10" soccer player and all around party kind of guy. Many of his friends have been seen pining after Lisa, but most consider her to be 'out of their league.' Martin has a tendency to get others in trouble, and Lisa has made it a point to distance herself from him in recent years.
Stephanie Hale: Age 14, Lisa's younger sister, she's 5'3, A-cup, and very much idolizes her older sister. Lisa has put up with it, mostly because she would rather Stephanie follow her example than follow Martin's.

Robert Hale: Age 46, is Lisa's father. He works hard as a software engineer and keeps the family in a comfortable standard of living. His work requires him to travel frequently, overseeing projects around the globe, and in recent years, he's only been home 1-2 weeks a month.
Elizabeth Hale: Age 39, is Lisa's mother. She stands 5"9, and expects that Lisa will likely grow another few inches to match her own height, if not taller. Her long brown hair has started to fade in recent years, and her full D-cup breasts are starting to fell the pull of gravity, still, she has kept active and maintains a fit figure. She has been a stay at home mom since finishing college, having given birth to Lisa in her senior year, and is very active in the community.

Tom Anderson: Age 18, is Lisa's on again / off again boyfriend. Currently off after Tom told her she shouldn't worry about getting the money to pay for college because there's no point of her going to school if she's going to stay home and take care of the kids. Tom will be attending the same college as Lisa plans to, but is attending on a foot ball scholarship. He stands 6'3", well muscled and is handsome in a 'rugged' kind of way.

Megan Rhodes: Age 17, is Lisa's best friend from child hood. She is a 5'5" blond, bubbly cheer leader with full C-cups. Megan is the one who encouraged Lisa to become a cheerleader. While she's generally a good girl, she's fallen into the trap of her own success and become something of a social butterfly. She goes to all the right parties, and hangs out with all the most popular people, which on occasion gets her (and Lisa) into trouble.

Others? Feel free to create your own!

RULES:
1) The Nexus does 2 things when it conducts a trade between the client, and the renter. First, reality itself is bent so that people will treat the client as Lisa, and will treat Lisa like the client. For all intents and purposes, they trade identities. Second, The Nexus will download skills from the client that will be necessary for Lisa to fill in their life while the client vacations in her life. Only skills are copied, no other memories.

2) Anything that would physically change the body, stays with the life it was done in. IE: If someone decides to dye their hair blond while living Lisa's life, Lisa's hair will become blond when she comes back to her life.

3) Clients can choose how long they want to live Lisa's life, it just costs more to stay as her longer.

Other than that, keep it reasonable. The story is rated 18+, sex is fine. Feel free to leave unexpected consequences for Lisa to return to when she returns to her life between rentals. You can either follow Lisa, or follow the person living her life, or flip back and forth, just make it clear who's POV you're writing from.

I may edit for grammar / spelling, and chapters that are particularly poorly written may be deleted. If you wish to reserve an option to continue writing a story line, please place <LOCKED> in the name of the branch.
